headline: As Trump and McConnell feud over GOP's future, Republican candidates tread lightly
author: David Jackson
sentences: McConnell, meanwhile, is refusing to talk about Trump's impact on the election at all, a pointed omission considering a slew of endorsements by the former president.
Trump hasn't been shy about ripping into McConnell and has made no secret of his desire to see Republicans demote the Senate minority leader.
WASHINGTON â€“ The most intense political contest of 2022 might be one that's not on any ballot: Donald Trump versus Mitch McConnell.
